resetPasswordMessage: Create a new password. Passwords must contain at least 7 characters and include 1 uppercase letter and 1 number.
passwordMaxLengthMessage: Passwords must contain no more than 32 characters. Current count: ${ passwordLength }
passwordMinLengthMessage: Passwords must be at least 7 characters
passwordRegexMessage: Passwords must contain 1 uppercase letter and 1 number
resetLinkExpired: Your reset link has expired. Please request a new one.
passwordHasBeenReset: Your password has been reset. You can now login using your new password.
passwordResetError: There was an error trying to reset your password, please try again.
